00065 bool ImageBMP::setNbBits(const unsigned short int nb)
00066 {
00067     if(nb>0 && nb<=4)
00068     {
00069         m_nbBits = nb;
00070         return true;
00071     }
00072     else
00073         m_nbBits = 2;
00074 
00075     m_isLoaded = false;
00076     return false;
00077 }
00078 
00079 long ImageBMP::capacity() const
00080 {
00081     return (this->width() * this->height()) / 2;
00082 }
00083 
00084 bool ImageBMP::load(EncodedData::DataFormat format)
00085 {
00086     EncodedData sizeData(EncodedData::UINT32);
00087     sizeData.initialize(m_nbBits);
00088 
00089     m_data.clear();
00090     m_data.setFormat(format);
00091     m_data.initialize(m_nbBits);
00092     int x=0, y=0;
00093     QSize size = m_img.size();
00094     unsigned short int andOperator = EncodedData::andOperator(m_nbBits);
00095 
00096     while(x<size.width() && y<size.height() && (x+y)<(32/m_nbBits))
00097     {
00098         QRgb pixel = m_img.pixel(x, y);
00099         int val = (qRed(pixel))&andOperator;
00100 
00101         sizeData.append(val);
00102         if(x==size.width()-1)
00103             y++;
00104 
00105         x=(x+1)%size.width();
00106     }
00107     quint32 nbOctets = sizeData.toUInt32();
00108 
00109     m_logger->debug("loaded size: " + QString::number(nbOctets));
00110 
00111     quint32 pixelLimit = (32/m_nbBits) + ((nbOctets*8)/m_nbBits);
00112 
00113     while(x<size.width() && y<size.height() &&
00114           (quint32)(x+(y*size.width())) < pixelLimit)
00115     {
00116         QRgb pixel = m_img.pixel(x, y);
00117         int val = (qRed(pixel))&andOperator;
00118 
00119         m_data.append(val);
00120         if(x==size.width()-1)
00121             y++;
00122 
00123         x=(x+1)%size.width();
00124     }
00125 
00126     m_logger->debug("last loaded pixel: " + QString::number(x+(y*size.width())));
00127 
00128     m_isLoaded = true;
00129     return true;
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool ImageBMP::compile()
00133 {
00134     int x=0, y=0;
00135     QSize size = m_img.size();
00136     m_swap = 255 - EncodedData::andOperator(m_nbBits);
00137 
00138     EncodedData sizeData(m_data.size());
00139     m_logger->debug("Setted size: " + QString::number(sizeData.toUInt32()));
00140 
00141     sizeData.initialize(m_nbBits);
00142     while(sizeData.hasNext())
00143     {
00144         QRgb pixel = m_img.pixel(x, y);
00145 
00146         int val = sizeData.read();
00147         int red = changeColor(qRed(pixel), val);
00148 
00149         m_img.setPixel(x, y, qRgb(red, qGreen(pixel), qBlue(pixel)));
00150         if(x==size.width()-1)
00151             y++;
00152 
00153         x=(x+1)%size.width();
00154     }
00155 
00156     m_data.initialize(m_nbBits);
00157     while(m_data.hasNext())
00158     {
00159         QRgb pixel = m_img.pixel(x, y);
00160 
00161         int val = m_data.read();
00162         int red = changeColor(qRed(pixel), val);
00163 
00164         m_img.setPixel(x, y, qRgb(red, qGreen(pixel), qBlue(pixel)));
00165         if(x==size.width()-1)
00166             y++;
00167 
00168         x=(x+1)%size.width();
00169     }
00170 
00171     m_logger->debug("last setted pixel: " + QString::number(x+(y*size.width())));
00172 
00173     return true;
00174 }

00176 bool ImageBMP::save(QString outputDirPath)
00177 {
00178     m_filePath = outputDirPath+"/"+m_shortName;
00179 
00180     if(!m_img.isNull())
00181     {
00182         return m_img.save(m_filePath, "BMP", 100);
00183     }
00184     else
00185         m_logger->warning("Cannot save file: image is null.");
00186 
00187     return false;
00188 }
00189 
00190 int ImageBMP::changeColor(int color, const int val)
00191 {
00192     return (color&m_swap)+val;
00193 }
